Alt News conducted a search on Google us: 3. Alt News could not find any additional information about the video or verify the narrative with which it was posted, except for the fact that it appeared online as early as September 2016.
In 2016: the same video was circulated with a claim that the individuals in the video were members of the Islamic theological center Darul Uloom Deoband. However, this claim was debunked by Darul Uloom Deoband itself, which released a statement denying any involvement in the burning of the Pakistani flag.
